topic.title: Privacy and anonymity?
topic.body: if Tor is not activated by default here in Zeronet, so how privacy and Anonimity is managed ?

topic.title: P-2-P
topic.body:
Hello,
Who agrees with me that ZeroNet is not really Peer-to-Peer 
Because we connect and pass by a Tracker and if there is not a Tracker, we won't have the conection
My point of view, it is semi Peer-to-peer
before anwser read this presenttion on page "7" https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1_2qK1IuOKJ51pgBvllZ9Yu7Au2l551t3XBgyTSvilew/pub?start=false&loop=false&delayms=3000#slide=id.g9a3b93883_1_0 
Lets keep it realistic discussion

1_12zyC2je1V8Sfq6C5d6CSzUkjYf4bEdva4.body:
> [nofish](#comment_655_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): you can easily hide your ip using Tor

No that is not the question, if I don't use Tor, would surfing here in ZeroNet respects my anonymity ?

1_18ZbdG9rMgLWzfFrWMkyGXtSv7MyPfUuSj.body:
can we download with Torrent while we have a proxy network or a VPN ? that may be too slow, right ?
Thx

2_17d3S7saDQP5phkkWS9F7tMJTymqLCQmig.body: how do u know its annonymous ? can u prove it ?
